title: The Bikini Killer
description:
During the 1970s, young people followed the Hippy Trail were looking for peace and love. They found serial killer Charles Sobrahj, a handsome, charismatic master con man who poisoned them, stole their identities, and burned them alive.

Source materials for this episode cannot be listed here due to character limitations. For a full list of sources, please visit https://redcollarpodcast.com/
author: content@audiochuck.com (audiochuck)
